quickSummary: The Bouncing Souls are a punk rock band known for their anthemic songs and energetic performances, with notable works including "Hopeless Romantic" and "True Believers." Joining them on the tour are Dave Hause & The Mermaid, Mercy Union, and H2O, each contributing their own take on punk and alternative rock. The concert will take place at the UC Berkeley Theater, which has a capacity of approximately 1,500. The venue is located in Berkeley, California.
